definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: It also wants to use that knowledge to augment its own germ warfare program.
sentences.chinese: 它也想利用這一知識來充實自己的細菌戰計劃。

sentences.english: NATO and rebels plan to use bacteriological warfare against Sirte.
sentences.chinese: 北約和反對派計劃對蘇爾特使用細菌戰。
